title: [Large-Scale] Participatory Design-Based Software Engineering Education: Human-Centered Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming knowledge and experience in mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Participatory project-based learning conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment. Learners solve software design problems in administrative/managerial work settings to enhance practical competencies.

learning_goals: Based on real-world work scenarios, learners can define software design problems and propose at least three solutions following an analytical framework.

In a participatory design environment, learners complete collaborative projects utilizing domain knowledge (mathematics) and iteratively improve prototypes at least twice using an evolutionary approach.
Referencing open-source community cases, learners establish team collaboration strategies in distributed environments and share outcomes on digital platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
